document.id: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R20-015
document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R20-015
Contract Authorization with Portfolio Monitoring, LLC
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 28th day of July, 2020, the following Resolution was adopted:

recital.text: the Pueblo has utilized the services of Dr. Hugh Cohen of Portfolio Monitoring, LLC, for at least four (4) years, to oversee and monitor the sizeable investment funds and Portfolio of the Pueblo; and,

the services provided by Portfolio Monitoring, LLC helped lower the Pueblo's financial risks and protect the Pueblo's portfolio from significant losses during the recent volatility in the markets caused by the uncertainty surrounding the COVID-19 pandemic; and,
the services provided by Portfolio Monitoring, LLC have also helped the Pueblo earn significant additional revenue while reducing risks; and,

Portfolio Monitoring, LLC has proposed a contract extension with reduced fees, and the Council finds it in the best interest of the Pueblo to authorize the continuation of Portfolio Monitoring, LLC services.
that the Council hereby enacts the attached amendment to the law entitled, "AUTHORIZING A CONTRACT EXTENSION WITH PORTFOLIO MONITORING, LLC, FOR INVESTMENT FUND PROTECTION."

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on July 28, 2020, at a meeting with a vote of 10 in favor, 0 opposed, 0 abstaining and 0 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.

attachment.heading: CONTRACT AUTHORIZATION WITH PORTFOLIO MONITORING, LLC

section.heading: Short Title
section.text: This enactment shall be known as the amendment to the law entitled "AUTHORIZING A CONTRACT EXTENSION WITH PORTFOLIO MONITORING, LLC, FOR INVESTMENT FUND PROTECTION ("Amendment")."

section.heading: Purpose
section.text: The purpose of this Amendment is to authorize the continuation of services provided by Portfolio Monitoring, LLC to the Pueblo.

section.heading: Findings
section.text: Title 6, Chapter 6.6.10, Section 6.6.10.030 of the Code is hereby amended to add the following subsections (f), (g), (h), and (i) as follows:

para.text: The Pueblo has utilized the services of Dr. Hugh Cohen of Portfolio Monitoring, for at least four years, to oversee and monitor the sizeable investment funds and portfolio of the Pueblo; and

The services provided by Portfolio Monitoring, LLC helped lower the Pueblo's financial risks and protect the Pueblo's portfolio from significant losses during the recent volatility in the markets caused by the uncertainty surrounding the COVID-19 pandemic; and
The services provided by Portfolio Monitoring, LLC have also helped the Pueblo earn significant additional revenue while reducing risks; and
The Council finds it in the best interest of the Pueblo to authorize the continuation of services provided by Portfolio Monitoring, LLC to the Pueblo.

section.heading: Amendment
section.text: Title 6, Chapter 6.6.10, Section 6.6.10.040 of the Code is hereby amended to replace the existing subsections (a) and (b) with the following new subsections:

para.text: The Council hereby authorizes the Governor to negotiate and execute a contract for the continuation of services provided by Portfolio Monitoring, LLC, to provide professional monitoring services of the Pueblo's investment accounts and to report their written findings to the Council, Governor, and Investment Committee; and

The Council hereby authorizes the Governor to negotiate and execute a contract with Portfolio Monitoring, LLC on a sole-source basis due to their highly specialized securities monitoring services and extensive experience.
